verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Finally , Melania Trump [V: has] reappeared . After more than three weeks out of the public eye , the first lady strolled into a White House event Monday f

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Finally , Melania Trump has reappeared . [ARGM-TMP: After more than three weeks out of the public eye] , [ARG0: the first lady] [V: strolled] [ARG1: into a White House event] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] f
